document.full_text: a south sudanese official accused the north of planning a darfur-style genocide against the south, in an escalation of rhetoric less than four months ahead of the secession of his oil-producing region.
document.title: south sudan accuses north of planning genocide
lines_and_colors: a south sudanese official accused the north of planning a darfur-style genocide against the south, in an escalation of rhetoric less than four months ahead of the secession of his oil-producing region.
